alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:57AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Warming Temperatures through Saturday... Confidence is increasing that a marine layer will develop along the coast through the weekend. This could cause daytime high temperatures to be lower than areas who do not see the marine layer develop. At this time there is a greater than 90 percent chance that temperatures will warm to the upper 60s along the coast on Friday. There is a lower probability that temperatures could warm into the upper 70s, but if the marine layer diminishes, temperatures could soar into the upper 70s for communities further inland. The warmest day will be Friday with the most likely scenario showing temperatures warming into the upper 60s along the northern and central gulf coast and into the low 70s along the southern Gulf coast.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
